Hi Vibha,

I hope you are well. 

Regarding your query about the allocation under the Structure BU, please note that the D&O insurance is a group policy covering all Chalhoub Group managed companies. Hence, as the cover is on an entity/group level, the allocation has been made to the respective entities proportionally based on turnover and allocated to the respective structure BUs.

Hope the above clarifies.

Thank You & Best Regards, 
Hagop

Thank You & Best Regards, 
Hagop
